text: Ronald Eugene Rivera (born January 7, 1962) is an American football coach. He is the head coach for the Washington Football Team of the National Football League (NFL). Before becoming a coach, Rivera played college football at the University of California, Berkeley in the early 1980s, where he was recognized as an All-American linebacker for the Golden Bears. Rivera was born in Fort Ord, California. In August 2020, he was diagnosed with an aggressive rare form of lymphoma. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:National Football League coaches Category:Sportspeople from California
title: Ron Rivera
